Posts.Content: lindaonthelake wrote: Did anyone out there not receive the boost?  The Dr. said he didn't think I needed it but don't trust his judgement.  IDC, Stage 1, Grd 2, ER+; 0/3 lymphs....lumpectomy done (large as I had 2 places one was DCIS)....the margins were close.  Why not do a boost?  is the a problem with them.  I feel like my insurance is driving the decisions and they are hoping something else will kill me. Dx 3/23/2011, IDC, <1cm, Stage I, Grade 2, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Radiation Boost lindaonthelake lindaonthelake
